replies.body: Hey guys how exactly do you self gift yourself?
Click on the Skins tab in the store. It will be there labelled 'Mystery Skin'
It says 490 rp, i thought a gift was supposed to be free??
yea i agree i thought its meant to be free its asking for 490RP wtf....
mystery gifting has never been free... they've just given the ability to select yourself as the recipient instead of a friend. Like a lucky dip, you might get a legendary for 490 RP as an example.
The person that buys the gift never gets it for free but have to pay for it and you are the person buying it
The free gift is a mystery CHAMPION, self-mystery gifting is different (like when you gift a friend a mystery champ/skin)
IKR??? WHERES THE MYSTERY GIFTS???
i know hard i clicked on the skins store and looked everywhere and couldn't find it, but i am aware it is not free
@sephyre, no it's not. It should still be enabled right now?? Not on ffeatured page or under sknis
Hey dude, it did go down a little early but we've made sure it's working again.
Apologies.. just re-read.. it went down at Midday.. but seriously.. who does that.
So... it says that it's extended till midnight.. but seems to be disabled as at now?
No idea of the chances, but I got Pulsefire Ezreal first try. Lol.
did you pay for it or was it free???
As of 2100 02/02/2016 there is no link in the store to the mystery skin, nor any mystery skin item under the skins tab (I've placed "myst" in the search under skins to no avail)

Is it just me or is it gone again?

And its not February 2, 11:59 AEDT.

I'm having the same issue, i can't find it at all and i have limited time left! I sincerely hope i'm given an extra day or something.

Checked skins tab, checked gifting centre, cannot find what was described by Riot worker Sephyre.
i dont have the self gifting icon does anyone else have this problem?
ye man
Hey guys, it went down a little early. It should now be appearing in the shop again.
Can't find mystery gifts guys, should still be live until tonight true?
I can't tell if all these people are serious about the gifts being free, when have they ever been free in the past?

According to: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752934-Mystery-Gifting-FAQ
We are supposed to be able to receive 10 mystery gifts a day and yet I can only gift myself 4.  Even a friend (who has gifted me other items over the past week) was unable to gift me anything more....

Can someone please confirm if we are limited to 4 mystery skins a day regardless of the source or is this a bug? 

Further more, why is mystery gifting from a friend also limited by the same restriction? {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

yea i have read the site you posted, it does say your friend can send you 10 times of mystery gift and i think that you may only get 4 times for self gifting and i don't think mystery gifting is limited to the same restriction as self gifting. it probably a bug that cause the problem that won't allow you to receive gift from your friend. you be able to receive 10 gift from your friend or you can send 10 gift to your friend. it either got updated or it just a bug which you should inform riot.
soz i can't provide help, but i just like to give my thought after read your post

if your friend can't send you anymore skin, try to w8 one day and see if he can send you mystery skin, sometime it may have been an error when you friend try to send you skin, or it might be an network jamed

oh yeah i forgot to mention that self gift only happen in an event,and you say you can only self give mystery skin 4 times that probably the limits. so it different from sending mystery skin to your friend or receives mystery skin from your friend which allow 10times
I got spirit guard udyr first try :3

lol, gifting is just a trick , every time, they open the cheap champion or a cheap skin.
not even once they give me a higher price one.
I opened 4 yesterday, received 2 legendaries nunu bot and Annie in wonderland. As well as arctc warfare Caitlin and lepra veigar. So it all comes down to luck
if self mystery gifted but cant find it, does it open itself or do i have to find it to open it
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

who thort it ment you get a free misty gift?

i did
i dont know
Can't find the icon is it working only 11:35

I think the issue here is.. it went down at midday.. and I only just re-read and realized that.. but.. for those of us who aren't on holidays from university or sponging of the government or living in our parents basements or whatever.. kinda unfair Riot. Oh well.. will just save my RP until next mystery skin sale I guess.
When you miss out on the last day of self mystery gifting by 30mins {{item:3070}}
Why no fre skin you gotta buy it :'(
{{champion:9}}
i was really excited for these skins :(
this is bull crap
Help Pleaase!!!!!  I still cant seem to access any self mystery gifting and ive looked all through the store...
You should now find it on the front page of the store again.
how can i get my self mystery gift..i still havent got it..
You should now find it on the front page of the store again.
where is the self mystery gifting in the shop??
{{champion:17}} Someone gift me...i want omega squad teemo...
{{champion:99}} Someone gift me...I want star guardian lux...
Then both of you get a job and earn the money for it.
